00034 void BinaryData::append(unsigned char dat)
00035 {
00036         this->data.push_back(dat);
00037 }
00038 void BinaryData::append(unsigned char *dat)
00039 {
00040         //for(int i=0;i<(signed int)strlen(dat);i++)
00041         //      this->data.push_back(dat[i]);
00042 }
00043 void BinaryData::append(unsigned char *dat,int length)
00044 {
00045         for(int i=0;i<length;i++)
00046                 this->data.push_back(dat[i]);
00047 }
00048 void BinaryData::append(string dat)
00049 {
00050         for(int i=0;i<(signed int)dat.length();i++)
00051                 this->data.push_back(dat[i]);
00052 }
00053 void BinaryData::append(binaryData data)
00054 {
00055         for(int i=0;i<(signed int)data.size();i++)
00056                 this->data.push_back(data.at(i));
00057 }
00058 binaryData BinaryData::getData()
00059 {
00060         return this->data;
00061 }
00062 
00063 string BinaryData::serilaize(BinaryData data)
00064 {
00065         string temp;
00066         for(int i=0;i<(signed int)data.data.size();i++)
00067                 temp += data.data.at(i);
00068         return temp;
00069 }
00070 
00071 BinaryData* BinaryData::unSerilaize(string temp)
00072 {
00073         BinaryData *binr = new BinaryData;
00074         binr->data.clear();
00075         binr->append(temp);
00076         return binr;
00077 }
